data.script:
<script>
    import {
        Button,
        Ellipsis,
        Heading,
        Stack,
        Text,
    } from "@kahi-ui/framework";
</script>

<Stack.Container alignment_x="left" spacing="medium">
    <Button disabled>
        <!--
            NOTE: Wrapping text and Component together to
            prevent `Ellipsis` from getting icon spacing
        -->
        <Text is="span">
            Submit<Ellipsis />
        </Text>
    </Button>

    <Heading>
        Loading<Ellipsis />
    </Heading>
</Stack.Container>
data.title: Ellipsis Preview
